lead_paragraph: KIRSCHENBAUM--Bernard. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Bernard Kirschenbaum, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Bernard's wife, Susan Weil; his sister, Frances Brandt; his children, Sara and Christopher; his daughter-in-law, Janet Stein; his grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
